CustomField.description: Where resource requests (on the region, practice or group on which the utilization calculation is run) have a value for Probability (%) on the linked opportunity, determines the minimum threshold below which opportunity probability is not considered when calculating capacity demand by role. The default value is 0.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Where resource requests on a RPG on which the utilization calculation is run have a Probability (%) value on the opportunity, determines the minimum threshold below which opportunity probability is not considered when calculating capacity demand by role.
CustomField.label: Minimum Opportunity Probability
